nodes.text: The Warming Crystal was a type of crystal of somewhat value. It was described blue with a star in the middle and as the name suggests, also warm.
In approximately 39 BBY, the Jedi Knight Siri Tachi owned one which she gave to Talesan Fry. Nineteen years later, he returned it to her, only to have her give it to her secret lover Obi-Wan Kenobi.
